alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 11:24AM EST until March 02 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford...Rivervale...and Seymour. ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Shoals. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Williams. .Multiple rounds of recent rainfall preceded by snow melt, along with the current system moving through with wintry precipitation, will keep minor flooding ongoing along the East Fork White, Upper White and most of the Upper Wabash. Lower portions of the White and Wabash are expected to see moderate flooding, as expected precipitation amounts with the current system are highest over southern portions of central Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.5 feet, Water is near the center of the road at the first curve out of the Bedford Boat Club. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.3 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1115 PM EST.
